attributes.action: Increase the current mileage allowance (40p) to 55p per mile?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An Increase the mileage allowance which has been 40p per mile for the first 10,000 business miles traveled by car since at least 2002.  Considering the continuing increase in fuel prices 55p increase would be a fair allowance.
